Speaker.name: Octavia_Normal
Speaker.line1: Well, judging from the meal you brought me,

Speaker.name: Octavia_Happy
Speaker.line1: I'll allow you to pass the test.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Normal
Speaker.line2: You could be more attentive to my order, dear.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: I'm afraid I have to stay until the tea is ready, ma'am.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Surprise
Speaker.line2: I wasn't aware of that policy.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Normal
Speaker.line1: In that case, I have a thing or two to discuss with you.
